readable.title: 440184957_267f3f3a2b
readable.content: A clown shares cut-out pictures of children . a dirty looking clown holding up two paper cut outs of children with blond hair A man wearing a balloon hat and a grassy shirt holds up two large paper dolls . A man wearing a balloon hat holds up colored cut-out drawings of two men . The man wears balloons on his head and holds paper people .
